Control Name: 5.2.4 Ensure that Activity Log Alert exists for Create or Update Network Security Group Rule (Scored)
Control Statement: Monitoring for Create or Update Network Security Group Rule events gives insight into network access changes and may reduce the time it takes to detect suspicious activity.
